rooms.description: Serves as the main entrance and focal point, leading to other spaces.
Central living area connected with a central courtyard. Open to natural light.
Traditional Kerala kitchen with Vastu-friendly design, well-ventilated and open towards the north or east side.
Room designed for reading and studying, well-lit with windows facing east to encourage morning light.

openings.description: A courtyard in the center of the house, promoting natural ventilation and light. Follows Vastu principles for placement.
Spacious balcony off the living room to provide outdoor space and views of surrounding areas.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with attached balcony, following Vastu guidelines for placement and orientation.

openings.description: Spacious balcony connected to the bedroom providing private outdoor space, oriented towards the east or north as per Vastu.
